trans-unit.source: Visual Studio 2017 Licensing and Purchase question on payment if already paid for Visual Studio 2015 do we need to pay for Visual Studio 2017?
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 2017 Licensing and Purchase question on payment if already paid for Visual Studio 2015 do we need to pay for Visual Studio 2017?

trans-unit.source: I already paid for Visual Studio Professional 2015. Do I need to pay for Visual Studio 2017 and later versions?
trans-unit.target: I already paid for Visual Studio Professional 2015. Do I need to pay for Visual Studio 2017 and later versions?

trans-unit.source: If you purchased Visual Studio Professional 2015 or Visual Studio Professional 2017 as a stand alone license, you are not entitled to Visual Studio Professional 2019.
trans-unit.target: If you purchased Visual Studio Professional 2015 or Visual Studio Professional 2017 as a stand alone license, you are not entitled to Visual Studio Professional 2019.

trans-unit.source: Also, if you purchased a Visual Studio Subscription in the calendar year 2015 but did not renew it, you don't have access to Visual Studio 2019.
trans-unit.target: Also, if you purchased a Visual Studio Subscription in the calendar year 2015 but did not renew it, you don't have access to Visual Studio 2019.
